ambitionBoxData.Title: Pioneer e Solutions Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
We are looking for a skilled Mobile Application Developer to join our team. As a Mobile Application Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality mobile applications. This is a mid-level position requiring 4 to 6 years of experience in mobile app development. The role is based in Bangalore, Karnataka, India. This is a full-time position.

Qualifications and Skills

4 to 6 years of experience in mobile application development
Strong knowledge of mobile development frameworks and programming languages such as Android, iOS, and WSE
Experience with continuous integration, version control, unit testing, and technical design
Solid understanding of computer science fundamentals
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented, collaborative environment
Good communication and interpersonal skills
Roles and Responsibilities

Design and build advanced mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Optimize mobile applications for maximum performance and scalability
Conduct code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality of the applications
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices
Work closely with Product Managers, Designers, and other stakeholders to deliver high-quality mobile applications
Troubleshoot and resolve issues reported by users and provide technical support
Maintain code integrity and organization by implementing architecture and design patterns
Participate in the full mobile application development lifecycle, from ideation to release and post-release support.

title: Flutter Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
• Develop a robust and efficient Flutter-based mobile application that interfaces with GraphQL APIs.
  • Collaborate with our existing development team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
  • Optimize application performance and ensure scalability.
  • Implement clean, maintainable code following best practices and design patterns.
  • Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the application meets technical and functional requirements.
  • Stay updated with Flutter advancements and contribute to enhancing our development processes.
Requirements:
  • Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in mobile app development.
  • Proven hands-on experience in developing mobile applications using Flutter.
  • Strong understanding of GraphQL APIs and their integration into mobile applications.
  • Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and familiarity with Angular is a plus.
  • Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and best practices.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team environment.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Good communication skills and ability to articulate technical concepts effectively.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience with state management solutions in Flutter (e.g., Provider, Bloc).
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
Our pro-employee Policies
  • Annual Bonus
  • Company-sponsored training and certifications
  • Extensive medical insurance coverage.
  • Company-sponsored wellness programs access to gym and swimming facilities.
  • Periodic Rewards Recognition .
